name: UBX-TIM-TM2
description: This message contains information for high precision time stamping/pulse counting. The delay figures and timebase given in CFG-TP Configuration Items are also applied to the time results output in this message.

fields.name: ch
fields.description: Channel (i.e. EXTINT) upon which the pulse was measured

fields.name: flags
fields.description: Bitmask for various flags: bit 0 (mode): 0=single, 1=running; bit 1 (run): 0=armed, 1=stopped; bit 2 (newFallingEdge): New falling edge detected; bits 3-4 (timeBase): 0=Time base is Receiver time, 1=Time base is GNSS time (the system according to the configuration in CFG-TP Configuration Items for tpldx=0), 2=Time base is UTC (the variant according to the configuration in CFG-NAVSPG-* configuration items); bit 5 (utc): 0=UTC not available, 1=UTC available; bit 6 (time): 0=Time is not valid, 1=Time is valid (Valid GNSS fix); bit 7 (newRisingEdge): New rising edge detected.

fields.name: wnR
fields.description: Week number of last rising edge

fields.name: wnF
fields.description: Week number of last falling edge

fields.name: towSubMsR
fields.description: Millisecond fraction of tow of rising edge in nanoseconds

fields.name: towSubMsF
fields.description: Millisecond fraction of tow of falling edge in nanoseconds
